data.title: Parking&Garden!, Santa Maria Coghinas (updated prices 2024)
meta_keywords: S.Maria Coghinas Cozy Flat W/ Parking&Garden!
data.meta_description: Set in Santa Maria Coghinas and only 46 km from Sassari Railway Station, S.Maria Coghinas Cozy Flat W/ Parking&Garden!
data.text:
A surcharge applies for arrivals after check-in hours. All requests for late arrival are subject to confirmation by the property. The latest possible check-in, even if paying the surcharge, is 01:30. Late check-in fee: EUR 15 from 21:30 until 23:00; EUR 20 from 23:00 until 00:00; EUR 30 after 00:00.

Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

Please inform S.Maria Coghinas Cozy Flat W/ Parking&Garden! in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.

Quiet hours are between 22:00:00 and 08:00:00.

Guests under the age of 18 can only check in with a parent or official guardian.

If you cause damage to the property during your stay, you could be asked to pay up to â‚¬ 200 after check-out, according to this property's Damage Policy.

License number: R1980
